title: US Man Accused Of Plotting With 'Santa' To Poison Jewish Children: Report
content: Arrested in Moldova, Chkhikvishvili recruited others for violent acts and disseminated a manifesto promoting terrorism and ethnic cleansing.
summary: Arrested in Moldova, Chkhikvishvili recruited others for violent acts and disseminated a manifesto promoting terrorism and ethnic cleansing.

title: Arizona Toddler Dies After Father Leaves Her In Hot Car For Hours
content: A two-year-old Arizona toddler's life was cut short after she was left in a car for over three hours, while her father got "distracted" playing video games. Parker Scholtes' dad, Christopher Scholtes, 37, is now facing a murder charge.
summary: A two-year-old Arizona toddler's life was cut short after she was left in a car for over three hours, while her father got "distracted" playing video games. Parker Scholtes' dad, Christopher Scholtes, 37, is now facing a murder charge.

title: Trump's Veep Pick JD Vance's Wife And Her "Academically Strong" Family
content: Usha Chilukuri Vance, the wife of Donald Trump's vice presidential running mate, has a great-aunt in southern India, aged 96, celebrated in local media as the country's oldest active professor.
summary: Usha Chilukuri Vance, the wife of Donald Trump's vice presidential running mate, has a great-aunt in southern India, aged 96, celebrated in local media as the country's oldest active professor.

title: Opinion: A Shot In The Arm: Trump's Rise Suddenly Seems Inevitable
content: Even before the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump, American politics was churning. But after the dramatic developments of last week, it's spinning in a way few could have foreseen.
summary: Even before the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump, American politics was churning. But after the dramatic developments of last week, it's spinning in a way few could have foreseen.

title: Biden Told Privately By Ex-Speaker Nancy Pelosi He Cannot Win: Report
content: US President Joe Biden, who has tested positive for Covid for a third time, was reportedly been told by former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi that he could destroy the Democrats' chances of winning elections in November, due to his age.
summary: US President Joe Biden, who has tested positive for Covid for a third time, was reportedly been told by former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi that he could destroy the Democrats' chances of winning elections in November, due to his age.

title: "I'm Sick Of...": Biden Uses Covid Diagnosis To Attack Trump, Musk
content: US President Joe Biden has tested positive for Covid-19. The diagnosis, which came with mild symptoms, has been leveraged by his campaign team to target his principal political rival Donald Trump and tech billionaire Elon Musk.
summary: US President Joe Biden has tested positive for Covid-19. The diagnosis, which came with mild symptoms, has been leveraged by his campaign team to target his principal political rival Donald Trump and tech billionaire Elon Musk.

title: US Polls: 'Babydog' Steals Spotlight At The Republican National Convention
content: 'Babydog', the chunky English bulldog belonging to Governor Jim Justice was a sensation at the Republican National Convention.
summary: 'Babydog', the chunky English bulldog belonging to Governor Jim Justice was a sensation at the Republican National Convention.

title: South Korea Court Grants State Benefits To Gay Couples In Landmark Ruling
content: South Korea's supreme court on Thursday upheld a ruling that a same-sex partner was eligible for spousal benefits from state health insurance, a move hailed as a win for LGBTQ rights in a country that has lagged others in the region.
summary: South Korea's supreme court on Thursday upheld a ruling that a same-sex partner was eligible for spousal benefits from state health insurance, a move hailed as a win for LGBTQ rights in a country that has lagged others in the region.

title: Ukraine Rushes To Create AI-Enabled War Drones
content: AI drone development in Ukraine is broadly split between visual systems helping identify targets and fly drones into them, terrain mapping for navigation, and more complex programmes enabling UAVs to operate in interconnected "swarms"
summary: AI drone development in Ukraine is broadly split between visual systems helping identify targets and fly drones into them, terrain mapping for navigation, and more complex programmes enabling UAVs to operate in interconnected "swarms"

title: The Victor, The Convict, The Survivor: A Look At Donald Trump's Crazy Year
content: After obliterating his Republican rivals, becoming the first former president convicted of a crime, and surviving an assassination attempt, Donald Trump caps off a crazy year with his coronation as the Republican Party's presidential nominee.
summary: After obliterating his Republican rivals, becoming the first former president convicted of a crime, and surviving an assassination attempt, Donald Trump caps off a crazy year with his coronation as the Republican Party's presidential nominee.

title: "He Reflects A Lot Of My Personal Values": US Teens Back Donald Trump
content: Caden Schaefer-Rose will only just be 18 by the time of November's US election, but he is determined to cast his very first presidential vote -- for Donald Trump.
summary: Caden Schaefer-Rose will only just be 18 by the time of November's US election, but he is determined to cast his very first presidential vote -- for Donald Trump.

title: "We Didn't Expect To Be In This Position": JD Vance's Wife
content: Neither JD nor I expected to find ourselves in this position, said Usha Chilukuri Vance, the wife of JD Vance, at the Republican National Convention on Thursday.
summary: Neither JD nor I expected to find ourselves in this position, said Usha Chilukuri Vance, the wife of JD Vance, at the Republican National Convention on Thursday.

title: Upset Over Melted Candy Bar, US Man Runs Over Grandmother, Shot Dead By Cops

title: "Avoid Travel": Advisory Issued For Indians In Bangladesh Amid Unrest
content: Indian High Commission in Dhaka has issued an urgent advisory for Indian citizens and students in Bangladesh to avoid non-essential travel and minimise movement outside their residences due to the escalating unrest in the country.
summary: Indian High Commission in Dhaka has issued an urgent advisory for Indian citizens and students in Bangladesh to avoid non-essential travel and minimise movement outside their residences due to the escalating unrest in the country.

title: Bangladesh Students Continue Protests, Reject PM's Justice Pledge
content: Bangladesh students vowed Thursday to continue nationwide protests against civil service hiring rules, rebuffing an olive branch from Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina who pledged justice for seven killed in the demonstrations.
summary: Bangladesh students vowed Thursday to continue nationwide protests against civil service hiring rules, rebuffing an olive branch from Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina who pledged justice for seven killed in the demonstrations.

title: Britain's New Government Aims To Regulate Most Powerful AI Models
content: UK PM Keir Starmer's government said it would seek to establish appropriate legislation to place requirements on those working to develop "the most powerful AI models." Under Sunak, the government avoided introducing targeted AI regulation.
summary: UK PM Keir Starmer's government said it would seek to establish appropriate legislation to place requirements on those working to develop "the most powerful AI models." Under Sunak, the government avoided introducing targeted AI regulation.

title: More Than 40% Of Japanese Companies Have No Plan To Use AI: Reuters Poll
content: Nearly a quarter of Japanese companies have adopted artificial intelligence (AI) in their businesses, while more than 40% have no plan to make use of the cutting-edge technology
summary: Nearly a quarter of Japanese companies have adopted artificial intelligence (AI) in their businesses, while more than 40% have no plan to make use of the cutting-edge technology

title: "Unjustified": Russia On India Facing "Enormous Pressure" Due To Energy Ties
content: India is a great power that determines its national interests and chooses its partners, Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has said, describing as "completely unjustified" the "enormous pressure" on New Delhi.
summary: India is a great power that determines its national interests and chooses its partners, Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has said, describing as "completely unjustified" the "enormous pressure" on New Delhi.

title: Meta Decides To Suspend Its Generative AI Tools in Brazil
content: Meta Platforms said on Wednesday it decided to suspend use of generative artificial intelligence tools in Brazil in response to the government's objections to its new privacy policy regarding personal data and AI.
summary: Meta Platforms said on Wednesday it decided to suspend use of generative artificial intelligence tools in Brazil in response to the government's objections to its new privacy policy regarding personal data and AI.

title: What Donald Trump's 17-Year-Old Granddaughter Said About Him
content: Former US President Donald Trump's granddaughter Kai Trump took to the stage at the Republican National Convention on Wednesday night to share personal stories about her grandfather.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump's granddaughter Kai Trump took to the stage at the Republican National Convention on Wednesday night to share personal stories about her grandfather.
